Locale.Value:
Add: MSI builder expands the following macros in the MSI Name: [ProductVersion], [ProductName], [CompanyName], [CurrentDate]
Add: MSI builder now warns if a reserved name is used for a custom action
Upd: Improved speed of syntax checker
Upd: Retain last term in Find/Replace dialog between documents
Fix: Syntax check for V7 fails
Fix: Crash when launching PowerShell Version Selector
Fix: -iin operator not recognized by editor
